archimate:Resource.name: Data Aggregator
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB supports the ability to compose (aggregate) data from different services/service providers which are interacting with the Integration Layer using the Mediator ABB into one format, after they have been transformed into a consistent “enterprise” format (canonical form) by the Message Transformer ABB. It is used by the Mediator ABB.

properties.value: This ABB supports the ability to compose (aggregate) data from different services/service providers which are interacting with the Integration Layer using the Mediator ABB into one format, after they have been transformed into a consistent “enterprise” format (canonical form) by the Message Transformer ABB. It is used by the Mediator ABB.
